name: Up at Night
description:
Publish date: 7/27/2018

Last updated: 7/30/2018

Up at Night is a short,  survival text-adventure game where you play as a child. You wake up in the middle of the night to a strange noise. What happens afterwards...leaves it up to you survive.

This project was made following the Udemy course Complete C# Unity Developer 2D - Learn to code making games.

Source code: https://github.com/SaloGitHub/Up-at-Night
